413940.name: Robotpencil Presents: Design Core Principles
413940.description:
60 minute video process on how you can improve your sense of visual design with better understanding and application of my favorite tools for design.

Layer Caking
Rules of Three
Counter Balance

Also I'll touch on other basic design stuff that you should keep in mind such as unity, variety, texture, values, etc.

On top of all that I'll give you some things you can practice to get better at design.

This package includes

-HIRES JPEG PSD
-PDF file of design wiki
-Photoshop tools.
413940.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
